All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.EditableValueHolder, javax.faces.component.StateHolder, javax.faces.component.ValueHolder, netgest.bo.xwc.components.security.SecurableComponent, netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIEditableValueHolder
Direct Known Subclasses:
SplitedLookup
public class Attribute
extends AttributeBase

This components renders a label and the input component for a DataFieldConnector The inputType is automatic calculated based on the renderType returned from the DataFieldConnector but can be overwrited for any valid AttributeBase input field Example: <-- Wrong Way --> <-- Write Way --> Can't have children

Author:
jcarreira
